Burrito Supreme

14.50

Your choice of chile colorado, chile verde, or grilled chicken. Refried beans and topped with red chile sauce and cheese.

15.75

Your choice of chicken, along with grilled onions, peppers, and refried beans. Wrapped in a flour tortilla, topped with red chile sauce, guacamole, and sour cream.

13.50

Drinks

Ask your server about menu items that are cooked to order or served raw. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness.
